==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Hülfe}} {{qualifier|now obsolete, but used in variation up until the early 20th century}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|helfe}}, {{m|gmh|hilfe}}, from {{inh|de|goh|helfa}}, {{m|goh|hilfa}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*helpō}}, {{m|gem-pro|*hilpiz|t=help}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*helpaną|t=to help}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*ḱelb-}}, {{m|ine-pro|*ḱelp-|t=to help}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈhɪlfə/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Hilfe.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Hilfe.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Hilfen}} # [[help]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Geburtshilfe}} * {{l|de|hilflos}} * {{l|de|Hilfsmittel}} * {{l|de|Hilfssprache}} * {{l|de|mithilfe}}, {{l|de|mit Hilfe}} * {{l|de|Mithilfe}} * {{l|de|Aushilfe}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|helfen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|de|flieh}}
